full_text: From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (OAG)* (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov To: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6) @bop.gov Cc: Ray Ormond bop.gov Subject: Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death Sent: Sun, 11 Aug 2019 13:29:15 +0000 Gentlemen. Do you have time for a quick update call before I leave for my trip with the AG? Does 12 noon work? If there is something new and pressing, we can do a call earlier. (b)(6) (b)(7)(C) On Aug 10, 2019, at 10:20 PM, Hugh Hurwitz <HHurwitz@bop.gov> wrote: How do they have this info? Unbelievable. https://www.breitbart.com/politics/2019/08/10/report-prison-guards-skipped-mandatory-checks-before-jeffrey-epsteins-death/ Hugh Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

text_blocks.content: From: (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) (OAG)* (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) @usdoj.gov To: Hugh Hurwitz (b)(6) @bop.gov Cc: Ray Ormond bop.gov Subject: Re: Reuters: Prison Guards Skipped Mandatory Checks Before Epstein Death Sent: Sun, 11 Aug 2019 13:29:15 +0000
Gentlemen. Do you have time for a quick update call before I leave for my trip with the AG? Does 12 noon work? If there is something new and pressing, we can do a call earlier.
On Aug 10, 2019, at 10:20 PM, Hugh Hurwitz <HHurwitz@bop.gov> wrote: How do they have this info? Unbelievable.
Hugh Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as (b)(6) and (b)(7)(C). The email is a conversation between officials regarding the Epstein death and related news reports.
